targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  ci.build_id AS Build#,
  ci.branch_Name AS BranchName,
  ci.artifact_id AS Artifact#,
  ci.action_Type AS Action,
  ci.tests AS TotalUnitTests,
  ci.test_errors AS TestErrors,
  ci.test_failures AS TestFailures,
  ci.skipped_tests AS SkippedTests,
  ci.test_execution_time AS TestExecTime,
  ci.test_success_density AS TestSuccessDensity,
  ci.ci_date AS Date,
  ci.pipeline_status AS Pipeline_Status,
  ci.pipeline_duration AS Pipeline_Duration  
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics ci
WHERE
  ci.ci_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
	AND service_Name = '$ServiceName'
	AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
	AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ci.ci_date DESC;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(coverage) AS Coverage,
  AVG(new_coverage) AS NewCodeCoverage,
  AVG(lines_to_cover) AS LinesToCover,
  AVG(new_uncovered_lines) AS NewUnCoveredLines,
  AVG(uncovered_lines) AS UnCoveredLines,
  AVG(new_lines_to_cover) AS NewLinesToCover
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(duplicated_lines) AS DulicateLines,
  AVG(duplicated_blocks) AS DuplicatedBlocks,
  AVG(new_duplicated_blocks) AS NewDuplicatedBlocks,
  AVG(duplicated_lines_density) AS DuplicatedLinesDensity,
  AVG(new_duplicated_lines_density) AS NewDuplicatedLinesDensity,
  AVG(duplicated_files) AS DuplicatedFiles
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(violations) AS TotalIssues,
  AVG(new_violations) AS NewCodeIssues,
  AVG(open_issues) AS OpenIssues,
  AVG(accepted_issues) AS AcceptedIssues,
  AVG(false_positive_issues) AS FalsePositiveIssues
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(sqm_issues) AS Issues,
  AVG(new_sqm_issues) AS NewIssues
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(ncloc) AS TotalLines,
  AVG(statements) AS Statements,
  AVG(functions) AS Functions,
  AVG(classes) AS Classes,
  AVG(files) AS Files,
  AVG(comment_lines) AS CommentedLines,
  AVG(comment_lines_density) AS CommentLinesDensity
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(complexity) AS Complexity,
  AVG(cognitive_complexity) AS CognitiveComplexity
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(sast_issue_total) AS Total,
  AVG(sast_issue_blocker) AS Blocker,
  AVG(sast_issue_critical) AS Critcal,
  AVG(sast_issue_high) AS High,
  AVG(sast_issue_medium) AS Medium,
  AVG(sast_issue_low) AS low
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(sca_issue_total) AS Total,
  AVG(sca_issue_blocker) AS Blocker,
  AVG(sca_issue_critical) AS Critcal,
  AVG(sca_issue_high) AS High,
  AVG(sca_issue_medium) AS Medium,
  AVG(sca_issue_low) AS low
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(twist_vulnerabilities_total) AS Total,
  AVG(twist_vulnerabilities_blocker) AS Blocker,
  AVG(twist_vulnerabilities_critical) AS Critcal,
  AVG(twist_vulnerabilities_high) AS High,
  AVG(twist_vulnerabilities_medium) AS Medium,
  AVG(twist_vulnerabilities_low) AS low
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  CAST(ci_date AS DATE) AS time,
  AVG(twist_compliance_total) AS Total,
  AVG(twist_compliance_blocker) AS Blocker,
  AVG(twist_compliance_critical) AS Critcal,
  AVG(twist_compliance_high) AS High,
  AVG(twist_compliance_medium) AS Medium,
  AVG(twist_compliance_low) AS low
FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
WHERE 
service_Name = '$ServiceName'
AND artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
AND ci_date IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CAST(ci_date AS DATE)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  cd.build_id AS Build#,
  ci.service_Name AS Service_Name,
  cd.started_by AS StartedBy,
  cd.approver AS Approver,
  cd.artifact_id AS Artifact#,
  cd.action_Type AS Action,
  cd.cd_date AS DeploymentDate,
  cd.env_level AS EnvLevel,
  cd.deployment_status AS DeploymentStatus,
  cd.total_tests AS TotalTests#,
  cd.passed_tests AS PassedTests,
  cd.failed_tests AS FailedTests,
  cd.notrun_tests AS NotRunTests,
  cd.tests_status AS TestsStatus,
  cd.tests_coverage AS QACoverage,
  cd.test_duration AS TestDuration,
  cd.test_tool AS TestingTool,
  cd.pipeline_status AS PipelineStatus,
  cd.pipeline_duration AS ExecutionDuration  
FROM devopsdata.CDT_Metrics cd
JOIN devopsdata.CI_Metrics ci ON cd.artifact_id = ci.artifact_id
WHERE
    cd.cd_date BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
	AND ci.service_Name = '$ServiceName'
	AND ci.artifact_id IN ($ArtifactId)
	AND cd_date IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY cd.cd_date DESC;

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT group_Name FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
ORDER BY group_Name;
list.label: GroupName
list.name: GroupName
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT group_Name FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics
ORDER BY group_Name;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT area_Name FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics WHERE group_Name IN ('$GroupName') ORDER BY area_Name;
list.label: AreaName
list.name: AreaName
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT area_Name FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics WHERE group_Name IN ('$GroupName') ORDER BY area_Name;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT service_Name FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics WHERE area_Name IN ('$AreaName') ORDER BY service_Name;
list.label: ServiceName
list.name: ServiceName
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT service_Name FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics WHERE area_Name IN ('$AreaName') ORDER BY service_Name;

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT artifact_id FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics WHERE service_Name IN ('$ServiceName') ORDER BY artifact_id;
list.label: ArtifactId
list.name: ArtifactId
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT artifact_id FROM devopsdata.CI_Metrics WHERE service_Name IN ('$ServiceName') ORDER BY artifact_id;
